Articles.Content:
Hello everyone!

I was just browsing some KSP vids on YouTube when i stumbled upon this magnificent video.

Enjoy!
Oh this trailer should definitely be an official trailer! It almost brought a tear to my eye... Beautiful!
Awesome trailer, The music is beautiful, it is from the cloud atlas trailer if I remember. I liked that movie as well.
Tremendous! It so encapsulates why I play this game.
That trailer is so awesome, I knew it before, but I really like to watch it
Beautiful. And very well done. If i wouldn't already, i'd fall in love with this game. Simply by watching this trailer.
Nice trailer! As we say here: "Fort, trÃƒÂ¨s fort"

Guys, i have a question. Before the Great Forum Collapse i found a link to very funny video about Earth, space, science etc. It started with two astronauts talking during EVA, and there was singing Stephen Hawking. Unfortunately i don't remember the title, and link is lost. Does anyone remember the name o this clip, or could provide a link?

Guys, i have a question. Before the Great Forum Collapse i found a link to very funny video about Earth, space, science etc. It started with two astronauts talking during EVA, and there was singing Stephen Hawking. Unfortunately i don't remember the title, and link is lost. Does anyone remember the name o this clip, or could provide a link?
Oh my god I remember this. I...I think I actually shed a tear over this trailer. It's just amazing.
hey! community managers! this should be the official trailer!
This trailer is simply amazing, as is this game.

They would have to license the song and the video from the creator in order to make this an official trailer. That costs money. Why not just let it self promote, seems to be working well so far. Although it is an awesome video
I love that trailer. Really expresses how EPIC this game is(and more so in the future) in scope.

Unfortunately the video is down, does anybody know where to get it now? or have it saved?

Edited May 25, 2013 by Anthlon

Unfortunately the video is down, does anybody know where to get it now? or have it saved?

Info about why the trailer was taken down: http://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/1ewr1d/emi_ganked_the_build_fly_dream_trailer_from/

The Trailer can be seen here: http://vimeo.com/66837288
